titleStmt.title: S. P. Burton et al., Affidavit
CWG2582

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Kentucky --
Boyle County Court -- October 23d 1861

At a County Court held by us this day, under summons of the ^County^ Clerk to fill the vacancy in the office of Presiding Judge, occasioned by the resignation of Hon. Speed S. Fry, we certify that James P. Mitchell, Esq. was duly elected to fill said vacancy until the next regular election.
Given under our hands, this 23d day of October, 1861.

S. P. Burton
J. H. Fife
W. H. Prewitt
Clifton Rodes
Henry Bruce
J. W. Hamner
C. T. Worthington
H. P. Bottom
Justices of the Peace.

Att: Jas F. Zimmerman C. B. C. C.
A Copy:
Att: Jas F. Zimmerman, Clerk

Boyle Co
Pres: Judge
J. P. Mitchell
vice
S. S. Fry
resigned
